directoryList

static String[] directoryList(java.lang.Object path, java.lang.Object options)
List contents of a directory
Parameters:
path - of directory
options - configure how this method will operate
  • fullpath = boolean. Whether or not to return full paths. (default = false)
  • type = all, file, or directory. Limit the list to a specific type. (default = all)
  • regex = regular expression. If specified, only file/directory names that match this expression will be returned. (default = empty)
Returns:
true on success, otherwise throw Exception

path - of directory
Returns:
true on success, otherwise throw Exception

static java.lang.Boolean exportContainer(java.lang.Object fmpro, java.lang.Object containerField, java.lang.Object path, java.lang.Object options)
Save FileMaker container field to file.
Parameters:
fmpro - object from ScriptMaster
containerField - name of field in FileMaker
path - to save containerField to
options - configure how this method will operate
  • overwrite = boolean. Whether or not to replace existing file with exported file, if a file with the same name already exists. (default = false)
Returns:
true on success, otherwise throw Exception

Parameters:

Returns:

uriEncode

static java.lang.String uriEncode(java.lang.String s)
Encode a string so it can be processed by java.io.File as a URI. This is necessary because spaces will be replaced with + by default, which makes the path invalid.
Parameters:
s - string to encode
Returns:
encoded string

zip

static java.lang.Boolean zip(java.lang.Object fmpro, java.lang.Object src, java.lang.Object dest, java.lang.Object options)
Zip contents of a container field, file, or entire directory.
Parameters:
fmpro - object from ScriptMaster
src - field, file or directory to zip
dest - path to zip file
options - configure how this method will operate
  • overwrite = boolean. Whether or not to overwrite output file. (default = false)
  • level = number from 0-9. Compression level for zip file. (0 = no compression, 9 = highest compression) (default = 6)
  • buffer = integer. Buffer size to use when reading/writing to file (default = 1024)
Returns:
true on success, otherwise throw Exception

user
Returns:

zipHelper

private static void zipHelper(java.lang.Object input, java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream output, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Integer buffer = 1024)
Add an InputStream or File to a ZipOutputStream with the specified name
Parameters:
input - can be any of the following: InputStream, File, or String filePath
output - ZipOutputStream
name - name of Zip Entry (file/folder name as it appears in the zip file)
buffer - size to use when reading from input, defaults to 1024
